dataRoles.description: A unique ID to represent each object to display on the map
dataRoles.name: category

dataRoles.description: Longitude of a point to draw a line to.
dataRoles.name: DestinationLongitude

dataRoles.description: Latitude of a point to draw a line to.
dataRoles.name: DestinationLatitude

dataRoles.description: Feature Reference for GeoJSON / KML / Shapefiles / Vector Tiles
dataRoles.name: featureRef

dataRoles.description: Field of type Date & Time. Allows the daylight terminator overlay to display as it would at the given time, rather than the current time.
dataRoles.name: Time

grayscale.description: Convert the background layer to grayscale. 0 = no grayscale, 100 = full grayscale *where possible.

defineValues.displayName: Define Start, Mid and End Values

sizeBehaviour.description: Size is based on the measure value starting at 0 pixels (explicit) or between a min and max value. If all values are the same the min value will be used.
